description.message: Easily block and redirect websites using customisable rules to help you stay focused and productive.

paragraph.message: To block a website or resource, type part of its name into the input field marked "Type Block URL" â€” for example, entering "facebook" will block all related subdomains. In the field marked "Type Redirect URL", enter the full redirect address, including the protocol, such as "https://google.ca". If the redirect field is left empty, the site will simply be blocked. Click the Save button to apply the rule. To update a rule, please delete the old one and add a new entry.

blockurlonlyascii.message: Only ASCII characters are allowed in the block URL
